nodes.text: The Bivall were a sentient species of tall bipeds with lanky bodies, large eyes mounted on stalks, crested heads, and long fingers that were native to Protobranch, a planet located in the Core Worlds. The species' lives revolved around water, but they did not need it to thrive and could settle far from it. Their scaly skin ranged in color from white and red to green. Because of their high intelligence, all Bivalls made good physicians, political advisors, researchers, and scientists. Sionver Boll and Okalin were members of this species.
